const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "index",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      price_range: {
        type: "keyword",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "index",
  id: 1,
  document: {
    designation: "spoon",
    price: 13,
    price_range: "10-100",
  },
});
console.log(response1);
